dflt:switch.cond: ((utils.count('unclassified', 'D-131', dp) > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (utils.count('unclassified', 'D-132', dp) > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (utils.count('unclassified', 'D-133', dp) > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (utils.count('unclassified', 'D-134', dp) > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (utils.count('unclassified', 'D-135', dp) > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (utils.count('unclassified', 'D-136', dp) > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (utils.count('unclassified', 'D-137', dp) > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (utils.count('unclassified', 'D-138', dp) > 0 ? 1 : 0)) >= 2
(utils.count('unclassified', 'D-127', dp) > 0 && utils.count('unclassified', 'D-128', das) > 0) || (utils.count('unclassified', 'D-128', dp) > 0 && utils.count('unclassified', 'D-127', das) > 0)

dflt:execute.expr: var temp = dp; dp = dr; dr = temp;

dflt:assign.expr: (poidsnn >= 3300 && agegest >= 40 ? 1 : (poidsnn >= 2400 && agegest >= 38 ? 2 : (poidsnn >= 2200 && agegest >= 37 ? 3 : (poidsnn >= 2000 && agegest >= 37 ? 4 : (poidsnn >= 1800 && agegest >= 36 ? 5 : (poidsnn >= 1700 && agegest >= 35 ? 6 : (poidsnn >= 1500 && agegest >= 33 ? 7 : (poidsnn >= 1300 && agegest >= 32 ? 8 : (poidsnn >= 1100 && agegest >= 30 ? 9 : (poidsnn >= 800 && agegest >= 28 ? 10 : 11))))))))))
